message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. As we're just starting the negotiation, I'm willing to make a generous offer. I'm looking for $900000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product for $875000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you and my initial offer.
I appreciate your revised offer, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $860000 for the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm willing to consider it, but I still think the product's value is worth a bit more. I'm willing to meet you at $870000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering our negotiation history, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $865000 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product for $880000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your last offer, Alice. Considering our negotiations, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $875000 for the product.

I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob. However, I still think the product's value is worth a bit more. I'm willing to meet you at $885000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your final offer, Alice. Considering our negotiations, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $880000 for the product.
